name: @mlvis/graph-builder
description: A thin wrapper over graph.gl for exploring a graph interactively.
author: Javid Hsueh

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile
scripts.transpile: NODE_ENV=production babel src -d dist -s --config-file ../../babel.config.js && npm run copy

publishConfig.note: lerna requires this to publish scoped packages
